list.abs: in its filing against the Wongs , the SEC said it would seek to " depose witnesses , subpoena bank and brokerage records and take other discovery expedited basis " .在对王氏夫妇的诉讼文件中，美国证交会表示，将寻求“证人证词、索取银行和券商纪录……并快速完成其它取证”。
depose beer yeast becomes material , distilling , the liquid take out of Yeast cell , apping to soy sauce .以废啤酒酵母为原料，通过酶解提取细胞内含物制得酵母抽提液、灭酶，应用于酱油工艺进行发酵试验。
The witness deposed that she had seen the accused on the day of the murder ., 证人宣誓证明在谋杀案发生当天她看见过被告.
they deposed , exterminated and deprived him of communion .他们罢免、消除和褫夺他的教派。
